name: Trans Am Bike Race

distances.name: Full Course
distances.description: Self-supported transcontinental race across America - Oregon to Virginia

terrain: Every terrain type in America - Pacific coast, Cascade mountains, Rocky Mountains, Great Plains, Appalachian mountains, mixed surfaces including paved and gravel
weather: Extreme variability - mountain snow, plains heat, coastal rain, thunderstorms, all seasons across the route
uniqueCharacteristics: One of the world's toughest self-supported bike races
Completely self-supported - no outside assistance allowed
Riders must navigate and find their own food/lodging
Mixed terrain including significant gravel sections
200,000+ feet of climbing across mountains and plains
Race can take 2-4 weeks to complete
Dot watching by fans following GPS trackers
